item.description:
Come and check out this year's Annual Harvest Celebration at Hopkins Vineyard on beautiful Lake Waramaug! Wine tasting events at Hopkins Vineyard are always fun! Hopkins Vineyard really knows how to do this right! Lots of excellent cheese, fruit and bread samplings that never run out, and a laid-back live band for entertainment.

Please don't miss this event! Here is what you get:

- Wine tasting

- Artisan cheese, pate, and fresh fruit sampling

- Local artisan food sampling

- Live music by the Hopkins Trio

- Complimentary Hopkins Vineyard wine glass

DON'T FORGET TO BRING LAWN CHAIRS

Tickets are $27.00

Or $22.00 online

Click HERE for more information about Hopkins Vineyard.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Hopkins Vineyard "32" year "Wine Festival"
